forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 67F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 67F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
